detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value: This section is restricted to students in Year 4 of the Finance option in the Bachelor of Commerce program. COMM 476 was formerly numbered COMM 486H. detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
This section is restricted to students in Year 2 or higher of programs other than the Bachelor of Commerce (COMR 457 cannot be counted for credit in the BCom program). It will be offered in a flexible learning format. Rather than attending traditional in-class lectures for three hours each week, students in a flexible format section will spend more time with online learning materials in preparation for fewer scheduled in-person meeting times. Instructors will provide exact dates for in-person meeting times closer to the start of term.

Students must also register in discussion section D00 - the discussion component of the course has been cancelled (there is no activity for students to attend), but could not be deleted from Workday for 2024W.

If you have been admitted by your Faculty to the Minor in Commerce or you are in another approved program for which this course is a requirement, and you are unable to register in any section of this course in your final year of study, you may submit a registration request using the form available at mybcom.sauder.ubc.ca/regi-assist. Commerce course registration is managed centrally by the UBC Sauder Undergraduate Office. Change of Registration (Add/Drop) forms signed by instructors will not be accepted.

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes

uiLabels.WDRES.FACETEDSEARCH.SymanSyntax:
Boolean logic can be expressed using AND, OR, NOT, and (). 
Exact phrases can be surrounded by double quotation marks. 
Example: ("software engineer" OR computer science) AND ~manager~.
